snippet: The Forest Service denied an application for a road easement that would clear the way for the development of hundreds of homes, retail shops and hotels outside Grand Canyon National Park.
abstract: United States Forest Service denies proposal for road easement that would have cleared way for residential and commercial development in Tusayan, Ariz, outside Grand Canyon National Park.
lead_paragraph: The Forest Service denied an application for a road easement that would clear the way for the development of hundreds of homes, retail shops and hotels outside Grand Canyon National Park.

headline.main: Development Plan Near Canyon Hits Hurdle
headline.print_headline: Development Plan Near Canyon Hits Hurdle
